commands.name: az sql db tde key revalidate
commands.summary: Revalidates a database's encryption protector key.
commands.syntax:
az sql db tde key revalidate [--database]
                             [--ids]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--server]
                             [--subscription]
examples: az sql db tde key revalidate --database mydb --resource-group MyResourceGroup --server myserver

commands.name: az sql db tde key revert
commands.summary: Reverts a database's encryption protector key to server level.
commands.syntax:
az sql db tde key revert [--database]
                         [--ids]
                         [--resource-group]
                         [--server]
                         [--subscription]
examples: az sql db tde key revert --database mydb --resource-group MyResourceGroup --server myserver
